titleStmt.title: My reverend brother, whereas His sacred Majesty, in his brief graciously granted for the relief of the French Protestants, hath commended the pursuit of that brief to the paternal care of the bisops of every diocese; ...
titleStmt.author: Barlow, Thomas, 1607-1691.

notesStmt.note: Title taken from first lines of text.
Signed at end: Thomas Lincolne [i.e. Thomas Barlow, Bishop of Lincoln]; and dated: Buckden. April 10. 1686.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
